text-node.description: Renders a full featured product search result page. If the http parameter "format" is set to "ajax" only the product grid is rendered instead of the full page.
This pipeline is to return a URL with query parameters to build a search phrase.
Renders a full featured content search result page.
Determines search suggestions based on a given input and renders the JSON response for the list of suggestions.
This pipeline is used to execute a binary search based on a customer's profile attributes.
Set CacheTag to true so that the redirect template will set the <iscache>.
This decision node is used to bypass the authentication until after a category has been checked if it's public or not
Renders the partial content of the product grid of a search result as rich html.
Executes a product search and puts the ProductSearchResult into the pipeline dictionary for convenient reuse. This is also used in Product pipeline for product navigation i.e. next/prev.
Executes a content search and puts the ContentSearchResult into the pipeline dictionary for convenient reuse.
Renders all the contents available in the digital library folder.
